sentences.english: Patients receiving long-term ketoconazole should be monitored for hepatotoxicity .

sentences.english: In children, the most common reason for liver transplantation is biliary atresia .

sentences.english: Anti-viral agents were stopped according to the recommendations of the Asian Pacific Association for the Study of the Liver.

sentences.english: Alcohol use with acetaminophen is especially bad for the liver.
